content.rendered:
On the 21st of July 2018, Porsche Club Indonesia (PCI) held their yearly Motokhana event at Cikeas, Indonesia. 

We made our way from Pantai Indah Kapuk to Cikeas where we met up with the rest of the PCI members. 

As PCI was celebrating Porsche’s 70 years of sports cars, they arranged the cars in a way that would represent a large 70. 

The cars and owners had a chance to show off their skills with a time attack.

They also had some time to let loose and have some sideways fun with their cars.

All in all was a great event!
